title: Emails-accurate emails-email scrape- data mining
snippet:
Can you find accurate emails?  My list is a call list with company names, addresses, phone numbers AND THE OWNER/CEO's full name. I also have a SIC code and size of company....I need the Owner/CEO's email.  I have done this before and the results vary.  Some of the best vendors use "Lexus/Nexus" to find emails, others scrape from the internet.  My list has 3,600 Companies on it and I would like as many emails as I can get BUT THEY NEED TO BE ACCURATE!

These are all very regional located in Southern California....

I have paid by the job but would rather pay based on the number of emails you find....

Let me know what you can do!
